stats.name: fumbles
stats.description: The number of times a player/team has fumbled the ball

stats.name: fumblesLost
stats.description: The number of times a fumble is recovered by the opposing team

stats.name: fumblesForced
stats.description: The total number of forced fumbles.

stats.name: fumblesRecovered
stats.description: The number of fumbles recovered.

stats.name: fumblesRecoveredYards
stats.description: The number of yards gained after a fumble is recovered.

stats.name: fumblesTouchdowns
stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: offensiveTwoPtReturns
stats.description: The number of two point attempts that is returned by the offense.

stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown by the offense.

stats.name: defensiveFumblesTouchdowns
stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown by the defense.

stats.name: avgGain
stats.description: The average gained yards per position.
